user.title: Amazon Parent Dashboard Setup
user.description:
Connect to the Amazon Parent Dashboard authentication add-on.

Make sure you have:
1. Installed the 'Amazon Parent Dashboard Auth' add-on
2. Started the add-on
3. Completed authentication via the add-on web interface

data_description.addon_url: URL of the authentication add-on (default: http://localhost:8100)

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to the authentication add-on. Please verify the add-on is running and the URL is correct.
error.invalid_auth: No valid authentication found. Please complete authentication through the add-on web interface first.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for details.

abort.already_configured: Amazon Parent Dashboard is already configured
